urls.title: International award redemption
urls.description: Find out how many miles you'll need for a one-way international flight award ticket or service class upgrade award - Routes and values may change without prior notice. Refer to www.mabuhaymiles.com for updates. - You may call PAL Reservations or visit the Mabuhay Miles Service Center, or any PAL Ticket office for more information. Canton (Guangzhou), Macau, Quanzhou (Jinjiang), Taipei, Xiamen Fukuoka, Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh (Saigon), Phnom Penh, Shanghai Bali (Denpasar), Beijing, Guam, Jakarta, Kuala Lumpur,

data.text:
@IamMeOxie collected. Each piece of baggage should weigh no more than 32 kg (70lbs). A baggage exceeding 32kg weight limit should be repacked, otherwise, it will not be accepted for carriage. 

(3/4)

urls.title: Carry-on baggage
urls.description: Each passenger is allowed one piece of carry-on baggage with a maximum total dimension of 56cm x 36cm x 23cm (22in x 14in x 9in) and maximum weight of 7 kgs. (15 lbs). In addition to the free carry-on baggage allowance, a passenger is allowed to carry on-board a maximum of two (2) of any the following items: a small handbag pocket book or purse an overcoat, wrap or blanket a small camera or binoculars laptop with case a reasonable amount of reading material duty free bag infant's food for consumption in

data.text:
@IamMeOxie For more information, please click this link:
https://t.co/rmL4LuZzsa

For weight system, passengers may bring 2 or more pieces as long as the total weight of the baggage does not exceed their baggage allowance, otherwise, applicable excess baggage charge shall be  

(2/4)

@IamMeOxie Hi. Each passenger is allowed one piece of carry-on baggage small enough to be placed in the overhead bin or under the passenger seat of the aircraft cabin with a maximum total dimension of 56cm x 36cm x 23cm (22in x 14in x 9in) and maximum weight of 7 kgs. (15 lbs).

(1/4)

data.text:
@yamachan82716 @KLCreativeStd Hi, Mira. You can rebook your flight online via Manage Booking on our website at https://t.co/ePCV247Zu7. 

For third-party issued bookings, kindly contact your travel agency for rebooking assistance. Thank you.
@ChukFarley Hi, Chuk. We are truly sorry for the inconvenience. We have sent you a DM to further assist your regarding this matter. Please check your inbox. Thank you.
@fid3010 You're welcome. :)
@fid3010 Yes, بن حسن. Our Legazpi flights operate at Bicol International Airport.
@JohnGravener This is noted, John. May we suggest to approach any PAL representative for further assistance. Thank you.
@fid3010 Hi, .بن حسن. Please be informed that we have available Legazpi flights. For PAL flights for July and beyond, please refer to this link:  https://t.co/cHg4ZaQEZ6. Thank you. ✈

@JohnGravener @philippineair We apologize for the inconvenience, John. Upon checking, the flight has been cancelled due to operational requirements. We understand that you intend to depart as scheduled, however your safety is our priority. May we confirm if you are still in the airport?
@yag_dxb Hi Milagros. We apologize for the delay. To further assist you, we sent you a DM. Kindly check.
@CarersLambeth Hi! We've sent you a DM. Kindly check your inbox.
@rycel_velasco Hi RycelV. We're sorry for the inconvenience. This is still being fixed. In the meantime, may we suggest to change your mode of payment (e.g. PayPal).
@i_shathaag We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@KSA8964 We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the delay, O. Please know that we would not disrupt a flight if it wasn't deemed necessary. Thank you for understanding.
@hey_Arwin We have sent you a DM. Thank you.

@abcdiney Hi, Claudine. Each passenger is allowed one piece of carry-on baggage small enough to be placed in the overhead bin or under the passenger seat of the aircraft cabin with a maximum total dimension of 56cm x 36cm x 23cm (22in x 14in x 9in) and maximum weight of 7kg. Thank you.
@whatthejanry You're welcome, Janry! See you on board and have a nice day. 😊
@whatthejanry We have sent you a DM, Janry. Thank you!
